data.eml:eml: Pinworms (Nematoda: Thelastomatoidea) from Insects Collected in Mississippi, USA, with description of a new species of Protrellus Cobb, 1920 from the Cockroach Ischnoptera deropeltiformis Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1865 (Blattaria: Ectobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carreno, Ramon A. (2018): Pinworms (Nematoda: Thelastomatoidea) from Insects Collected in Mississippi, USA, with description of a new species of Protrellus Cobb, 1920 from the Cockroach Ischnoptera deropeltiformis Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1865 (Blattaria: Ectobiidae). Zootaxa 4531 (4): 567-577, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.4.7
